sentences.sentence: He can, when he wants, theorise without oxygen at any height.
sentences.translation: 只要他愿意，可以随时随地理论化它。

sentences.sentence: Because its application is very extensive, so it's theorise and methods have been subject to attention.
sentences.translation: 由于它的应用非常广泛，所以关于它的理论与方法研究一直受到人们的关注。

sentences.sentence: The specialty, specialty objective and specialty feature are the basis of the theorise of speciality construction.
sentences.translation: 特色专业建设是高校办学特色、办学实力的体现，更是未来办学新增长点的培育基础。
